messages.content: You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```{% include terminology.html %}```
{% include terminology.html %}
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```To create, edit or delete workloads, go to _Forecast_{:.breadcrumbs}.```
Ga naar _Forecast_{:.breadcrumbs} om workloads aan te maken, te bewerken of te verwijderen.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```Workloads map the input channels of your external system, which records the details of your customer interactions. Based on imported contact data stored in queues, injixo Forecast will calculate a forecast for the workload. Configurable events, holidays, or opening hours influence the forecast result. You can also {% link_new import your forecast | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/import-forecast.md %} into workloads.```

Workloads brengen de inputkanalen van je externe systeem in kaart, dat de gegevens van je klantinteracties registreert. injixo Forecast gebruikt geïmporteerde contactgegevens die zijn opgeslagen in queues om een forecast voor de workload te berekenen. Configureerbare gebeurtenissen, feestdagen of openingstijden beïnvloeden het resultaat van de forecast. Je kunt je forecast ook {% link_new in workloads importeren | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/import-forecast.md %}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```In workloads, you configure the staff requirements calculation. Staff requirements are needed for scheduling.```
In workloads configureer je de berekening van de personeelsbehoefte. De personeelsbehoefte is nodig voor planningsdoeleinden.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```New to injixo Forecast? Learn {% link_new the basics | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/what-is-the-injixo-forecast.md %} first.```
Ben je nog niet zo vertrouwd met injixo Forecast? Maak je dan eerst vertrouwd met de {% link_new basisprincipes | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/what-is-the-injixo-forecast.md %}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```## Prerequisites```
## Vereisten
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Add {% link_new a native or CSV integration | features/acd-integration/cloud/how-integrations-work.md %} and import historical data for at least one queue.```
- Voeg {% link_new een native of CSV-integratie | features/acd-integration/cloud/how-integrations-work.md %} toe en importeer historische gegevens voor minstens een queue.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Import offered contacts, average handling time (AHT), and handled contacts. Workloads with multiple queues will need the handled contacts to display the AHT and calculate weighted averages.```

- Importeer aangeboden contacten, gemiddelde afhandeltijd (AHT), en afgehandelde contacten. Voor workloads met meerdere queues moet in de afgehandelde contacten de AHT en de berekende gewogen gemiddelden worden weergegeven.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```injixo creates queues using the data imported by an integration. The data import interval determines the interval of the queues created from that data. You can only add queues with the same interval to a workload.```

injixo maakt queues aan op basis van de gegevens die door een integratie zijn geïmporteerd. Het interval van de gegevensimport bepaalt het interval van de queues die op basis van deze gegevens worden aangemaakt. Je kunt alleen queues met hetzelfde interval aan een workload toevoegen.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```## Queues and channels```
## Queues en kanalen
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```Contact data imported by an integration is stored in queues. These queues are always associated with a channel. When you [create workloads](#create-workloads), you can filter queues by channel to assign them to the workload. Native integrations automatically set the channel for queues. Not all integrations support all channels.```

Contactgegevens die door een integratie worden geïmporteerd, worden opgeslagen in queues. Deze queues zijn altijd gekoppeld aan een kanaal. Als je [workloads aanmaakt](#workloads-aanmaken) kun je queues filteren op kanaal en ze aan de workload toevoegen. Native integraties stellen automatisch het kanaal in voor queues. Niet alle integraties ondersteunen alle kanalen.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```For a CSV integration, you need to set the channel manually. You can add a channel per column or select one channel for the file when you {% link_new map the columns | features/acd-integration/cloud/add-csv-integration.md | #map-the-columns %} of a CSV file.```

Voor een CSV-integratie moet je het kanaal handmatig instellen. Je kunt een kanaal per kolom toevoegen of één kanaal selecteren voor het bestand wanneer je {% link_new de kolommen van een CSV-bestand toewijst | features/acd-integration/cloud/add-csv-integration.md | #de-kolommen-toewijzen %}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```Integrations support the following channels:```
De volgende kanalen worden door integraties ondersteund:
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Calls```
- Gesprekken
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Chats```
- Chats
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Emails```
- E-mails
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Cases```
- Cases
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Documents```
- Documenten
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Social media```
- Sociale media
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```injixo Forecast groups queues by channel. You can only add queues with the same channel to a workload.```
injixo Forecast groepeert queues per kanaal. Je kunt alleen queues met hetzelfde interval aan een workload toevoegen.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```## Create workloads```
## Workloads aanmaken
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```We recommend creating one workload for each activity you want to schedule using staff requirements. Multiactivities require one workload for the multiactivity, and one workload for each subactivity.```

We raden aan om voor elke activiteit die je met personeelsbehoefte wilt inplannen een workload aan te maken. Multiactiviteiten vereisen één workload voor de multiactiviteit, en één workload voor elke deelactiviteit.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```1. Click _New workload_{:.doc-button} on top of the list.```
1. Klik boven de lijst op _Nieuwe workload_{:.doc-button}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```2. Enter the general information for your workload:```
2. Voeg de algemene informatie toe voor je workload:
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- **Name**: Unique name to identify your workload.```
- **Naam**: Unieke naam om je werklast te herkennen.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- **Time zone**: The {% link_new time zone | best-practices/working-with-timezones.md %} for the workload cannot be edited later.```
- **Tijdzone**: De {% link_new tijdzone | best-practices/working-with-timezones.md %} voor de workload kan later niet worden bewerkt.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```> Note```
> Opmerking
You are a translation assistant.
The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```>```
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```> - To save staff requirements for a planning unit, the time zone of the workload must match the time zone of the planning unit.```
> - Om de personeelsbehoefte voor een eenheid op te slaan, moet de tijdzone van de workload overeenkomen met de tijdzone van de eenheid.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```> - If you select a different time zone for your workload than the time zone of the integration used to import data, the imported data will be displayed as shifted in time in the workload. For example, if a CSV integration is set to UTC time and your workload is set to CEST time (UTC +2 hours), the imported data marked at 08:00 will be displayed at 10:00 in the workload.```

> - Als je een andere tijdzone voor je workload hebt ingesteld dan voor de integratie weermee je gegevens importeert, worden de geïmporteerdegegevens met tijdsverschuiving in de workload weergegeven. Als voor een CSV-integratie bijvoorbeeld UTC-tijd is ingesteld en je voor je workload CEST-tijd (UTC +2 uur), worden de geïmporteerde gegevens van 8:00 uur in de workload weergegeven om 10:00 uur.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- (Optional) **Holiday region**: Includes national holidays that may affect your forecast.```
- (Optioneel) **Feestdagen regio**: Omvat nationale feestdagen die je forecast kunnen beïnvloeden.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- (Optional) **Planning unit** and **Activity**: Required to {% link_new activate business hours | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/forecast-activate-business-hours.md %} in the **Business hours** section.```

- (Optioneel) **Eenheid** en **Activiteit**: Vereist om {% link_new openingstijden te activeren | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/forecast-activate-business-hours.md %} in de sectie **Openingstijden**.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```3. (injixo Classic only) Select an option from the **Pricing model** section:```
3. (alleen injixo Classic) Selecteer een optie uit de sectie **Prijsmodel**:
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- **Live mode** (paid): Invoiced monthly. Cannot be reverted to Test mode.```
- **Live-modus** (betaald): Maandelijks gefactureerd. Kan niet worden teruggedraaid naar de Testmodus.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- **Test mode** (free): You can only view forecasts and not transfer staff requirements for scheduling.```
- **Testmodus** (gratis): Je kunt alleen forecasts bekijken en geen personeelsbehoeften overdragen voor planningsdoeleinden.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```4. In the **Assign queues** section, select the queues for your workload.```
4. Selecteer de queues voor je workload in de sectie **Queues toewijzen**.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```To limit the queues displayed:```
Om het aantal weergegeven queues te verkleinen:
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Filter the queues by channel (Calls, Chats, etc.).```
- Filter de queues op kanaal (gesprekken, chats, enz.).
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Use the checkboxes to show selected, unselected or inactive queues. Inactive queues are those imported by integrations that have been deleted.```
- Vink de selectievakjes voor geselecteerde, niet-geselecteerde of inactieve queues aan. Inactieve queues zijn queues die geïmporteerd zijn door integraties die verwijderd zijn.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```- Use the search field over the table. You can search for queue, integration or workload name.```
- Gebruik het zoekveld boven de tabel. Je kunt zoeken op de naam van de queue, de integratie of de workload.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```Note: If a queue's interval or channel does not match that of the selected queues, all non-matching queues will be grayed out.```
Opmerking: Als het interval of kanaal van een queue niet overeenkomt met het interval of kanaal van de geselecteerde queue, worden alle queues die niet overeenkomen, uitgegrijsd.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```5. Click _Create workload_{:.doc-button}.```
5. Klik op _Workload aanmaken_{:.doc-button}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```The page displays historical data and a preliminary forecast version.```
De pagina geeft historische gegevens en een eerste forecastversie weer.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```When the calculation is completed, refresh the page to see the final forecast version.```
Als de berekening is afgerond, dien je de pagina te vernieuwen om de uiteindelijke forecastversie te bekijken.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```The new workload is displayed in the workloads list.```
De nieuwe workload wordt weergegeven in de lijst met workloads.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```If you are using injixo Essential, you can create Basic workloads. Basic workloads require at least two weeks of historical data. Basic workloads do not support business hours.```

Als je injixo Essential gebruikt, kun je Basic workloads aanmaken. Voor Basic workloads zijn minimaal twee weken aan historische gegevens nodig. Openingstijden worden niet ondersteund door Basic workloads.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```If you are using injixo Advanced or Enterprise WFM, you can create Smart workloads. Smart workloads generate a forecast based on just one day of historical data. Smart workloads support business hours.```

Als je injixo Advanced of Enterprise WFM gebruikt, kun je Smart workloads aanmaken. Smart workloads genereren een forecast op de historische gegevens van slechts een dag. Openingstijden worden ondersteund door Smart workloads.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```If you are using injixo Classic, you additionally need to select the Forecast model (Smart or Basic) for each workload. For Smart workloads, you must choose between the Live mode and the Test mode. The Test mode is free of charge but it only lets you see the forecast, and you cannot transfer staff requirements for scheduling purposes. The Live mode offers the full functionality and is billed monthly. Smart workloads in Live mode cannot be reverted to Test mode.```

Als je injixo Classic gebruikt, moet je daarnaast ook het forecastmodel (Smart of Basic) selecteren voor elke workload. Voor Smart workloads moet je kiezen tussen de Live-modus en de Testmodus. De Testmodus is gratis, maar laat je de forecast alleen bekijken. Je kunt geen personeelsbehoefte overdragen voor planningsdoeleinden. De Live-modus biedt de volledige functionaliteit en wordt maandelijks in rekening gebracht. Slimme workloads in de Live-modus kunnen niet worden teruggedraaid naar de Testmodus.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```<!-- ## Create workloads without historical data```
<!-- ## Create workloads without historical data
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```You only need an integration and historical data import if you want injixo to create forecasts. To add forecast data by {% link_new importing a forecast | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/import-forecast.md %} that has been generated externally or to {% link_new create constant staff requirements | features/forecast/requirement-scripts/requirement-constant.md %}, you can create a workload using the tab *Forecast Import*:```

You only need an integration and historical data import if you want injixo to create forecasts. To add forecast data by {% link_new importing a forecast | features/forecast/injixo-forecast/import-forecast.md %} that has been generated externally or to {% link_new create constant staff requirements | features/forecast/requirement-scripts/requirement-constant.md %}, you can create a workload using the tab *Forecast Import*:
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```1. Go to **Forecast**{:.breadcrumbs}.```
1. Go to **Forecast**{:.breadcrumbs}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```2. Click _Create Workload_{:.doc-button} in the upper right corner of the forecast page.```
2. Click _Create Workload_{:.doc-button} in the upper right corner of the forecast page.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```3. In the *Basic configuration* section, enter a **Name** for your new workload.```
3. In the *Basic configuration* section, enter a **Name** for your new workload.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```4. Select the **Time zone** to display data. Note: The set time zone must match the planning unit to save staff requirements.```
4. Select the **Time zone** to display data. Note: The set time zone must match the planning unit to save staff requirements.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```5. (Optional) Select the **Holiday region** to acknowledge all national holidays that affect your forecast for the year.```
5. (Optional) Select the **Holiday region** to acknowledge all national holidays that affect your forecast for the year.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```6. Select the **Planning unit** and the **Activity**. Note: You must select an option to calculate staff requirements.```
6. Select the **Planning unit** and the **Activity**. Note: You must select an option to calculate staff requirements.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```{{ 4 | image: 'Import Workload basic configuration section' }}```
{{ 4 | image: 'Import Workload basic configuration section' }}
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```7. Click the tab **Forecast import**.```
7. Click the tab **Forecast import**.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```8. Select your **Interval length** and the **Channel** for the data import. Both must correspond with your import file.```
8. Select your **Interval length** and the **Channel** for the data import. Both must correspond with your import file.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```{{ 5 | image: 'Import Workload parameters' }}```
{{ 5 | image: 'Import Workload parameters' }}
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```9. Click *Create workload*{:.doc-button}. -->```
9. Click *Create workload*{:.doc-button}. -->
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```## Edit workloads```
## Workloads bewerken
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```1. Select a workload from the workloads list or type the workload's name in the search field.```
1. Selecteer een workload uit de lijst met workloads of typ de naam van de workload in het zoekveld in.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```2. To change the workload details, click the {% icon pencil %}.```
2. Klik op het {% icon pencil %} om de gegevens van de workload te bewerken.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```You can add or remove queues without reimporting data. Listed queues are grayed out if their interval or channel does not match that of already assigned queues.```

Je kunt queues toevoegen of verwijderen zonder dat je opnieuw gegevens hoeft te importeren. Weergegeven queues worden uitgegrijsd als hun interval of kanaal niet overeenkomt met eerder toegewezen queues.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```3. Click _Save workload_{:.doc-button}.```
3. Klik op _Workload opslaan_{:.doc-button}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```The new configuration may update the forecast.```
Op basis van de nieuwe configuratie wordt de forecast mogelijk bijgewerkt.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```## Delete workloads```
## Workloads verwijderen
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```1. Click the {% icon trash %} next to the workload in the list.```
1. Klik op het {% icon trash %} naast de workload in de lijst.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```2. In the confirmation window, click _Delete Workload_{:.doc-button}.```
2. Klik in het bevestigingsvenster op _Workload verwijderen_{:.doc-button}.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```injixo stores the associated historical data. To reuse the data, add the queue or queues to another workload.```
injixo slaat de bijbehorende historische gegevens op. Om de gegevens te hergebruiken, voeg je de queue(s) toe aan een andere workload.
You are a translation assistant.

The following English text between triple back quotes is in Markdown format with Kramdown tags, translate it Dutch using plain language and keeping style, tone, formatting, and terminology: ```injixo Forecast combines your historical data with algorithms to generate high-quality forecasts. The algorithms recognize trends, patterns, and fluctuations included in your data. injixo Forecast uses many types of algorithms, such as ARIMA, Holt-Winters, exponential smoothing, regression, or gradient boosting.```

injixo Forecast combineert historische gegevens met algoritmen om hoogwaardige forecasts te genereren. De algoritmen herkennen trends, patronen en fluctuaties in je gegevens. injixo Forecast maakt gebruik van een groot aantal soorten algoritmen, zoals ARIMA, Holt-Winters, exponentiële vereffening, regressie of gradient boosting.
You are a translation assistant.

(Contact data only) | The data layout depends on how your CSV file was generated:
**Contact-based**: For contact details records that contain one line for every single contact. New data imports will overwrite the data that has been previously imported for the interval. If your file contains the same timestamp multiple times, this data will be added up for the interval.

**Interval-based**: For aggregated data that contains one line with all contact information per interval. Additionally, select the correct interval length that matches that of your CSV file. If you select an interval that is larger than the intervals of the uploaded files, you will see an error. If you do it the other way around, i.e. selecting a 15-minute interval for a file with larger intervals (e.g. 30 minutes), every missing (here: every second) interval will be filled with a 0 or the text no data, depending on what you configured in the **Handle missing values in intervals** option. |```

| **Layout van gegevens**
(Alleen contactgegevens) | De gegevenslayout is afhankelijk van de manier waarop je CSV-bestand is gegenereerd:

Omdat geïmporteerde contactgegevens worden samengevoegd in intervallen van 15 minuten, moet het interval van de eenheid ook 15 minuten zijn. Nieuwe gegevensimports overschrijven de gegevens die eerder zijn geïmporteerd voor het interval. Als je bestand meermaals dezelfde tijdstempel bevat, dan worden deze gegevens bij elkaar opgeteld voor het interval.

**Op intervalbasis**: Voor verzamelde gegevens die een regel bevatten met alle contactinformatie per interval. Selecteer ook de juiste intervallengte die overeenkomt met de intervallengte van je CSV-bestand. Als je een interval selecteert dat langer is dan de intervallen van de geüploade bestanden, dan verschijnt er een foutmelding. Als je andersom te werk gaat, en bijvoorbeeld een interval 15 minuten voor een bestand met grotere intervallen (bijv. 30 minuten) selecteert, dan wordt elke ontbrekende (hier: elke tweede) interval, gevuld met een 0 of de tekst “Geen gegevens”, afhankelijk van je selectie bij de optie **Behandel ontbrekende waarden in intervallen**.
